title: X-Large Top Floor Furnished Loft! Util., Cable, Internet Included!
posting_body: Welcome to the Pacific Inn Apartments, a hub for urban living in Bellevue, Washington.
Located in beautiful Downtown Bellevue, our micro, studio and loft apartments are designed for the city dweller with a taste road and a passion for adventure.
Available for move in for August.
Adjacent to bus routes and the new Seattle Light Rail coming soon.
Pacific Inn Apartments is all about motion and transit with an amazing walk score of 90!
Wherever your day takes you, you will come home to distinctive features including a new modern sleek kitchenette and modern furnishings.
Stay sharp with a workout in the fitness center.
Roll into your new adventure.
Downtown living does not get any better than this!
We are the only all inclusive property in Downtown Bellevue!
this means all of your utilities are included in your rent.
Also included in your rent: Parking, Expanded HD Cable, High Speed Internet/WiFi and weekly housekeeping!
We have an adorable X-Large Corner Top Floor Loft starting from $2,295.00 and up depending on size, location and availability.
Available for an August move-in!
Contact us today to schedule a tour of this special apartment home.
Hurry!
This apartment home will rent fast!
Cats Allowed.
No Dogs.
Rent Package Includes:
* Fully Furnished
* All Utilities Included
* HD Expanded Cable and High Speed Internet Included
* Parking Included In Our Secured Garage
* Weekly Housekeeping w/ Fresh Linens & Towels Weekly
* Modern Lobby w/ Business Center
* Onsite Professional Management & Maintenance
Deposit/Fees:
* $45 Per Person Application Fee Per Person Credit/Criminal/Rental Screening
* Security Deposit: $400 - $600.
Determined At Application Screening
* $75 Administration Fee
* $50 Cleaning Fee
* $200 Pet Fee
Advertised pricing, specials and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floor plans or all units.
